### afri currency xchange (ACX)

Our mission is to revolutionize the way cross-currency transactions are conducted in the African market, capitalizing on the vast growth opportunities on the continent. With increasing globalization and cross-border transactions, there is a growing need for a simple, accessible, seamless, secure and cost-effective cross-currency solution.

Our flagship solution, *afri currency xchange (ACX)* aims to address this demand by offering a seamless and secure platform for real-time peer-to-peer cross-currency transactions for the under-banked population in Africa.

We are committed to leveraging technology, strategic partnerships, and customer insights to provide financial services that empower individuals and business to transact across borders in their local currencies, to foster financial inclusion and drive socio-economic progress.

#### Key Features and Benefits:

*Real-time Cross-Currency Transactions:* Our platform provides interoperability between mobile money platforms across Africa enabling instant payments and money transfers between African countries, providing users with greater access, flexibility and speed.

*Advanced Technology Integration:* We are building a sophisticated sky computing infrastructure which seamlessly integrates technologies and cloud infrastructure providers to ensure a robust and scalable solution for our users.

*Enhanced Security and transparency:* Our platform is built on the Hyperledger fabric, leveraging the blockchain technology enabling transactions that are secure, immutable, transparent and verifiable instilling trust and confidence among our users while maintaining data privacy and security.

*Cost Efficiency:* By streamlining the currency exchange process and leveraging peer-to-peer matching, strategic liquidity reserves and partnerships with liquidity providers and local mobile money platforms, we reduce transaction costs, making cross-border transactions more affordable for individuals and businesses.

*Global Market Reach:* Our solution caters to a broad range of users, including international traders and investors, expatriates, travelers and individuals engaged in cross-border transactions across Africa.

### Our Services

#### R Shiny Application Development

We specialize in building and maintaining R Shiny applications and algorithms for computational and enterprise workflows. Our team develops lean applications optimized for scale and security, ensuring robust performance and seamless user experiences.

#### Sky Computing Infrastructure

We build sky computing infrastructures using cutting-edge technologies, enabling you to leverage the power of the cloud for your data science and analytics needs. Our expertise in R, Python, React, and cloud infrastructure providers like AWS allows us to design and implement sophisticated and scalable solutions.

#### Dashboards and Interactive Web Pages

Visualize your data effectively with our custom dashboard and interactive web page development services. We create intuitive and user-friendly interfaces that allow you to explore and analyze your data, providing valuable insights for informed decision-making.

#### Advanced Statistical Models

Our experienced team of data scientists and statisticians consult on and implement advanced statistical models tailored to your specific requirements. Whether it's predictive modeling, time series analysis, or machine learning algorithms, we have the expertise to help you derive meaningful insights from your data.

#### Big Data Pipelines and Computational Workflows

We specialize in creating and optimizing big data pipelines and computational workflows. Our team ensures efficient data processing, storage, and analysis, enabling you to harness the full potential of your data and unlock valuable insights.

#### R Shiny Application Debugging and Customization

If you have existing R Shiny applications or data science workflows that need debugging or customization, we can help. Our experts will identify and resolve issues, optimize performance, and tailor the applications to better align with your business objectives.
